document:
Selected Bibliography 
Bartholomew 2006 
Terese Tse Bartholomew. Hidden Meanings in Chinese Art. 
San Francisco, 2006. 
Cameron 2005 
Nigel Cameron. The Art of Feng Zhaolong. Exhibition catalogue. 
Hong Kong Club, Hong Kong, 2005. 
Chan 1976 
Flora Kay Chan. On Lui Shou-Kwan's Painting and Life in Hsiang 
Shuk Art Monthly, Vol. 99, 1976, pp. 145-147. 
Chan 1991 
Flora Kay Chan. The Development of Li Shoukian's Art. MPhil thesis. 
The University of Hong Kong, 1991. 
Chao 1979 
Chao Shao-an. The Art of Chao Shao-an. Exhibition catalogue. 
Hong Kong Museum of Art, Hong Kong, 1979. 
Chao 1983 
Chao Yimei. Painting: Works painted in co-operation by four masters of 
the Lingnan School: Zhao Shao-ying, Li Xiongqin, Guan Shanyue and Yang 
Shankun. Exhibition catalogue. Fung Ping Shun Museum, 
The University of Hong Kong, Hong Kong, 1983. 
Cheung 1999 
Cheung Wai-yee. Xianggang shuaiu tsantji yunjin. Hong Kong, 1999. 
Chiverton 1988 
Hugh Chiverton. From Museum Art to Performance Art in Night & 
Day (October 1988). 
Chou 1971 
Irene Chou. 'Wo de zuohua gucheng' in Zhongguoren yuekan, Vol. 4 
(January 1971), pp. 103-104. 
頁103-104） 
Chou 1986 
——Chinese Painting by Irene Chou. Exhibition catalogue. Fung Ping 
Shan Museum, The University of Hong Kong, Hong Kong, 1986. 
Chou 2000 
——The Universe is My Mind: Painting by Irene Chou. Exhibition 
catalogue. Hanart TZ Gallery, Hong Kong, 2000. 
2000） 
Chou 2006 
——University of the Mind: Zhou Liyan (Irene Chou) A Retrospective 
Exhibition. Exhibition catalogue. University Museum and Art Gallery, 
The University of Hong Kong, Hong Kong, 2006. 
Chou 2004 
Irene Chou et al. (eds.). From Representation to Revelation: The 
Transitional Works (1970-1990) of Irene Chou. Exhibition catalogue. 
Grotto Fine Art, Hong Kong, 2004. 
Chu Woo 2007 
Nancy Chu Woo. Coloration: Nancy Chu Woo. Exhibition catalogue. 
University Museum and Art Gallery, The University of Hong Kong, 
Hong Kong, 2007. 
Chu Woo 2009 
——Colour & Ink in Harmony: Nancy Chu Woo. Exhibition catalogue. 
Guangzhou Museum of Art, Guangzhou, 2009. 
2009） 
Chui et al. 2005 
Chui Tze Hung et al. 4 Decade Plus: The Art Career of Chui Tze Hung. 
Hong Kong, 2003. 
2005） 
Fang 1968 
Fang Chao-Ling. Fang Chao-Ling: Paintings. Exhibition catalogue. 
Groover Gallery. London, 1968. 
Fang 1988 
——Chinese Painting by Fang Zhaolong. Exhibition catalogue. Fung 
Ping Shan Museum, The University of Hong Kong, Hong Kong, 1988. 
1988） 
Fang 1992 
——Work by Fang Zhaolong. Hong Kong, 1992. 
1992） 
Fong et al. 2002 
Fong Yuk Yan, et al. (eds.). Painting by Kar Yeung. Exhibition catalogue. 
Yan Gallery. Hong Kong, 2002. 
Fung et al. 2010 
Raymond Fung Wing-kee et al. (eds.). The Art of Raymond Fung. 
Exhibition catalogue. University Museum and Art Gallery, The 
University of Hong Kong, Hong Kong, 2010. 
Guo 2013 
Guo Yanbing. He Cheng. Guangzhou, 2013. 
Hearn 2001 
Maxwell K. Hearn. 'Painting Academies and Western Influence' in 
The Metropolitan Museum of Art Bulletin. Vol 58, No. 3 (Winter 2001), 
pp. 20-25. 
Hinterthur 1985 
Peter Hinterthur. Modern Art in Hong Kong. Hong Kong 1985. 
Ho 1988 
Oscar Ho. 'Zhanneng yisha de keneng tung' in The Life and Art of Lau 
Wai Ming, edited by Huang Jinman, Hong Kong, 1998, pp. 8-9. 
Hong Kong 1995 
Hong Kong to Tradition: Huang Binheng 1865-1975. Exhibition catalogue. 
Urban Council, Hong Kong, 1995. 
Huang 1997 
Huang Dade (ed.). 'Guanyu ershi niandai de Fang Huang zhi zheng', 
in Huang Beer meisui wuji. Beijing, 1997, pp. 185-193. 
Huang 1998 
——Chronicle of Deng's Life in A China de Deng Erys: Caligrafia, 
Pintura, Sinere. Exhibition catalogue. Macao Museum of Art, Macao, 
1999, pp. 81-125. 
Huang 2008 
Huang Yanpei. Huang Yanpei riji. Beijing, 2008. 
Huang 2018 
Michelle Ying-Ling Huang. 'Establishing the Reputation of Liu Shou 
Kwan in Britain in the 1960s' in Arts of Asia 48.1 (January-February 
2018), pp. 42-49. 
Karl 1978 
Karl Nap-fu. 'Introduction' in An Exhibition of Painting by Lee Wai On. 
Exhibition catalogue. Hong Kong Arts Centre, Hong Kong. 1978. 
Kao 2008 
Kao May-ching. 'Fang Zhaolong: Her Times, Life and Art' in Hong 
Kong Visual Arts Yearbook 2006, edited by Harold Mok, Hong Kong, 
2008, pp. 33-54.
